name: django-vue-integration
description: # Process 1. make Normal django project     - Install Django.     - django-admin startproject project_name.     - django-admin startapp app_name.     - add app in INSTALLED_APPS in settings.py.     - create templates, static folder in root.     - copy bootstrap folder into static folder.     - create layout.html in templates folder and change path for bootstrap to local from cdn.     - create model, migrate and connect to view.
